official_title: A bill to prohibit the setting of certain gill nets and purse seine nets in the inland waters of the United States.
short_title: Inland Waters Conservation and Protection Act of 1982

summary.text: Inland Waters Conservation and Protection Act of 1982 - Prohibits: (1) the setting of certain gill nets in U.S. inland waters; and (2) the injuring or threatening of persons enforcing this Act.

titles.title: Inland Waters Conservation and Protection Act of 1982
A bill to prohibit the setting of certain gill nets and purse seine nets in the inland waters of the United States.
